attributes.action: Compell the BBC to Release the Balen Report
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC is refusing to release the Balen report, This is a report which could show the BBC's bias against Israel.
The BBC has been spending huge some of the fee payers money trying to prevent the release of the report.
Please force the BBC to release the report so that it is out in the open, so the public can see what they are so desperately trying to hide with our money.
